publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5222 Alasdair Morgan: Dark Skies over the Galloway Forest—That the Parliament notes the award of Dark Sky Park status to the Galloway Forest Park; recognises that this is the first such site outside the United States of America to be awarded Dark Sky status, which will clearly have a positive impact in attracting a new tourism sector to Galloway, and congratulates Forestry Commission Scotland on its successful bid.

S3M-5222 Alasdair Morgan: Dark Skies over the Galloway Forest—That the Parliament notes the award of Dark Sky Park status to the Galloway Forest Park; recognises that this is the first such site outside the United States of America to be awarded Dark Sky status, which will clearly have a positive impact in attracting a new tourism sector to Galloway, and congratulates Forestry Commission Scotland on its successful bid.
S3M-5222 Dark Skies over the Galloway Forest (lodged on 18 November 2009) Stewart Maxwell*
S3M-5222 Dark Skies over the Galloway Forest (lodged on 18 November 2009) Cathy Jamieson*
S3M-5222 Dark Skies over the Galloway Forest (lodged on 18 November 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
